name: Shri  Nachiketa Kelvani Mandal, Devli
briefDescription: Our NGO “Shree Nachiketa Kelavani Mandal-Devli is founded for the spread of education for all the youths of the society; and especially for the youth residing in rural areas and also with a view to be useful to  society during exigencies.•	This trust conduct all types of public activities, viz. educational,  health, cultural, removal  of poverties and to take possession of institutions doing such activities or to merge with them or to render help.•	This trust shall undertake such cultural and educational activities in Gujarat State.•	This trust shall undertake render every possible help to the people in times of drought, flood, disaster, earthquake, cyclones, fire or war. •	This trust shall do all the activities useful to society viz. Eye-bank, Blood bank, Kedney bank, etc. and also to help in such activities.
